greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If A122111(n) <= n, then a(n) = 1, otherwise a(n) = 0.
comment: f(n) = a(n) - A331169(n) is the characteristic function of A088902.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 13 2020
